title: Intrusive thoughts: 'What if I just started shouting right now?'
description: Dr Nina Higson-Sweeney, who was diagnosed with OCD when she was 10, explains when you should seek help.
content:
Have you ever sat in a boring meeting and wondered: "What if I just started shouting?" Or you're driving along and you think: "What if I crash?"
These unsettling scenarios are known as "intrusive thoughts" which the majority of us will experience fro... [3940 chars]

title: Trump says government will 'de-escalate a little bit' in Minnesota after Pretti shooting
description: The killing of Alex Pretti over the weekend led MInnesota officials and locals to renew calls for Trump to end his immigration operation there.
content:
President Donald Trump said his administration was "going to de-escalate a little bit" in Minnesota, after the second fatal shooting of a US citizen by federal immigration officers there.
"Bottom line, it was terrible. Both of them were terrible," he... [3870 chars]

title: Doomsday Clock at 85 seconds to midnight amid threats from climate crisis and AI
description: Planet closer to destruction as Russia, China and US become more aggressive and nationalistic, says advocacy group
content: Earth is closer than it has ever been to destruction as Russia, China, the US and other countries become “increasingly aggressive, adversarial, and nationalistic”, a science-oriented advocacy group said on Tuesday as it advanced its Doomsday Clock to... [1943 chars]

title: EasyJet ad banned for claiming bags available for £5.99
description: The airline said the fact there were no bags available for less than £5.99 meant the claim was not misleading.
content:
EasyJet has been told to stop claiming that carry-on baggage fees are available "from £5.99", after it failed to provide evidence to the advertising watchdog that passengers can stow luggage in a cabin at that price.
The Advertising Standards Authori... [1939 chars]

title: AI boom will produce victors and carnage, tech boss warns
description: Cisco chief executive Chuck Robbins compares AI to the dotcom bubble of the early 2000s.
content:
Winners will emerge from the Artificial Intelligence (AI) boom, but there will be "carnage along the way", the boss of a US tech giant has warned.
Chuck Robbins, chairman and chief executive of Cisco Systems, told the BBC the technology will be "bigg... [3858 chars]
